situation: During a PE class, O collapsed to the ground in the middle of a game and began seizing.
action: The teacher aide, unsure of how to handle a seizure, panicked and shouted for others to stay back while attempting to hold O still, which could potentially cause harm.
effect: The situation drew unnecessary attention, adding to the chaos, while O was left without appropriate care until medical help arrived. Training on first aid for seizures was later requested for staff.
